articles.title: Complex Cognition: Dinosaurs Were the First To Understand Others' Perspectives - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Researchers at Lund University found that visual perspective taking, the cognitive ability to follow an obstructed gaze, originated in the dinosaur lineage about 60 million years before appearing in mammals. This finding challenges the notion that complex cog…
articles.content:
ByLund UniversityMay 23, 2023
A new study revealed that the ability to follow someones gaze to an initially obstructed location, known as visual perspective taking, likely originated in the dinosaur… [+7148 chars]

articles.description: WhatsApp says it will allow users to edit messages, in a move that will see it match a feature offered by competitors like Telegram and Discord.The firm says...
